name: views.publish
desc: Publish a static view for a User.

user_id.desc: id of the user you want publish a view to.

view.desc: A view payload. This must be a JSON-encoded string.

hash.desc: A string that represents view state to protect against possible race conditions.

errors.duplicate_external_id: Error returned when the given `external_id` has already be used.
errors.hash_conflict: Error returned when the provided `hash` doesn't match the current stored value.
errors.missing_profile_id: A profile id was not provided when trying to publish a view of type profile.
errors.not_allowed_token_type: The type of token your app used when requesting this method is not allowed.
errors.not_enabled: Error returned if a `home` view is published but the Home tab isn't enabled for the app.
errors.not_implemented: The profile view experiment is not enabled for this user.
errors.view_too_large: Error returned if the provided view is greater than 250kb.
